## Welcome Rebecca Wilcox!

We are excited to welcome Dr. Rebecca Wilcox, a community ecologist specializing in birds, climate change, and novel ecosystems with experience ranging from the Pacific Islands to across the US from California to Florida. Dr. Wilcox is now on-site working full time on the Metrics of Wildlife Resilience project. You can find her on the first floor and online: rwilcox "at" calacademy "dot" org.
